transcript:
hey I heard a quote one time that said
instead of asking a clown why it's
acting like a clown ask yourself why you
keep hanging out at the circus see some
people have shown you who they are
they've shown you how they act and
they've shown you how they're going to
treat you and at some point in time you
have to be enough of an adult to decide
to walk away to decide that your
mentality and the way that you think and
the way that you feel is more important
than spending time with those people
because sometimes it's just better to be
by yourself than to be by somebody who
doesn't treat you the way that you
deserve to be treated
